vlive.korean: 트로이 시반과 함께 작업한 곡입니다 - 시반! We worked with Troye Sivan. - Sivan! 듣기 View video BTS : [Full] BTS Comeback Special: '보'이는 '라'이브 '해'요
vlive.english: We worked with Troye Sivan. - Sivan!

vlive.korean: 늦게까지 작업하는 거 몰라? - 거짓말 치지 마! You didn't know he's working so hard? - Don't lie! 듣기 View video OSEN : PENTAGON 펜타곤, 여동생에 소개시켜주고 싶은 멤버? #스타로드 04
vlive.english: You didn't know he's working so hard? - Don't lie!

vlive.korean: 막 여러 가지를 작업을 막 못 했어요 아무튼 - 그래요? I didn't get to work on many. Anyways... - Is that so? 듣기 View video BTS : [Full] BTS Comeback Special: '보'이는 '라'이브 '해'요
vlive.english: I didn't get to work on many. Anyways... - Is that so?

vlive.korean: [작업을 마친 세션 팀이 떠나고] - 시작해볼까? - 네! [After the session team leaves] - Shall we begin? - Yes! 듣기 View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 24. 파이널 2라운드! [코디 X 대힙래퍼] 콜라보 무대가 시작된다!
vlive.english: [After the session team leaves] - Shall we begin? - Yes!

vlive.korean: 그리고 뭔가... 다음 컴백 티저 작업을 해주시면... I hope they will work with us on our next album teaser videos... 듣기 View video Dispatch : 트와이스 ‘디아이콘’ 언박싱🐰🐹🦅
vlive.english: I hope they will work with us on our next album teaser videos...

examples.korean: The vice is bolted to the workbench. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 바이스는 작업대에 볼트로 접합되어 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The vice is bolted to the workbench. Add to Wordbook

examples.english: She scrubbed the counters down with bleach. Add to Wordbook

examples.english: Use a finer piece of sandpaper to finish. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The mechanic was wearing a pair of blue overalls. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 기술자는 푸른색 작업복을 입고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The mechanic was wearing a pair of blue overalls. Add to Wordbook
